rows.label: qst650305_0010
rows.name: Rex!

rows.label: qst650305_0020
rows.name: Kamuya!

rows.label: qst650305_0044
rows.name: Evello Mortem Tyrannis!

rows.label: qst650305_0048
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Phew...

rows.label: qst650305_0050
rows.name: That went well!

rows.label: qst650305_0060
rows.name: Nice one, Kamuya.

rows.label: qst650305_0070
rows.name: Thanks to you, and my trusty sword.

rows.label: qst650305_0080
rows.name: Bunch of show-offs, the lot of you.

rows.label: qst650305_0090
rows.name:
Yeah, sorry about that...
I've been trying real hard
not to give that impression.

rows.label: qst650305_0100
rows.name:
However, breathing was indeed
perfectly synchronized.

rows.label: qst650305_0110
rows.name: Thank you!

rows.label: qst650305_0120
rows.name: Tora can't stand obvious braggadocio...

rows.label: qst650305_0125
rows.name: [ML:undisp ](Small chuckle 1)

rows.label: qst650305_0130
rows.name:
Hey now! What's this about
braggadoccio, "friend"?

rows.label: qst650305_0140
rows.name: Stop it! Tora not consent!

rows.label: qst650305_0145
rows.name: [ML:undisp ](Small chuckle 2)

rows.label: qst650305_0150
rows.name:
I didn't mean to sound
like I'm bragging.

rows.label: qst650305_0160
rows.name:
But I see why it might look like
that, since I am *very* confident.

rows.label: qst650305_0170
rows.name:
Exactly! Kamuya never
hesitate, not one bit.

rows.label: qst650305_0180
rows.name: Ah, indeed...

rows.label: qst650305_0190
rows.name:
'Course he doesn't - he's
the most self-assured
character I've ever seen.

rows.label: qst650305_0200
rows.name: Thing is...

rows.label: qst650305_0210
rows.name:
I have a very good
reason to be confident.

rows.label: qst650305_0220
rows.name:
Just take a look at our
Drivers and you'll see.

rows.label: qst650305_0230
rows.name:
Rex, Nia, Meleph, Zeke...
You all have SUCH power.

rows.label: qst650305_0240
rows.name:
And I know that you'll never stop
using it for the benefit of others.

rows.label: qst650305_0250
rows.name:
Isn't that the kind of Driver
that's worth my confidence?

rows.label: qst650305_0260
rows.name:
That's why I act with certitude.
Because I just know it'll work out!

rows.label: qst650305_0270
rows.name:
No matter what obstacles we face, we
won't give up! No matter the enemy,
we'll fight with all we've got!

rows.label: qst650305_0280
rows.name:
That is...lot of faith to
place in Driver. Is not
difficult for Kamuya?

rows.label: qst650305_0290
rows.name: Not even a bit!

rows.label: qst650305_0300
rows.name: Besides, you all believe in me too!

rows.label: qst650305_0310
rows.name: Our bonds are the bonds of friendship!

rows.label: qst650305_0320
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]adlib yelp of surprise

rows.label: qst650305_0330
rows.name:
So you think Drivers and Blades
are just, like, mates...?

rows.label: qst650305_0340
rows.name: That's a novel thought.

rows.label: qst650305_0350
rows.name:
Hana think Kamuya is little
bit weirdo after all.

rows.label: qst650305_0360
rows.name: Ahahahaha![ML:undisp ]

rows.label: qst650305_0370
rows.name:
Come on guys, let's head back
to town. We need to tell them
the danger's passed!

rows.label: qst650305_0380
rows.name: I can tell he's showing off again...
